verses.verse: The <S%G4413>former<s%> <S%G3056>treatise<s%> I <S%G4160>made<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus<s%>, <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%>,

until <S%G891><s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was received <S%G353>up<s%>, after that <S%G1781>he<s%> had given <S%G1781>commandment<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> unto the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1586>chosen<s%>:

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3936>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3958>passion<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5039>proofs<s%>, <S%G3700>appearing<s%> <S%G1223>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> by the space of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>speaking<s%> the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%>, being assembled <S%G4871>together<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, he <S%G3853>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5563>to<s%> <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to wait <S%G4037>for<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%>, said <S%G191>he<s%>, ye heard from <S%G3450>me<s%>:

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3778>hence<s%>.

They <S%G4905><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, when <S%G4905>they<s%> were come <S%G4905>together<s%>, <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1487>dost<s%> <S%G600>thou<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> restore the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel<s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1097>It<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> for <S%G5216>you<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2540>seasons<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> hath <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> ye shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G1904>when<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G1904>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3427>my<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4540>Samaria<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G2078>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G2036>said<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, as they were <S%G991>looking<s%>, <S%G846>he<s%> was taken <S%G1869>up<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G5274>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>sight<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> looking <S%G816>stedfastly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G4198>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>went<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2066>apparel<s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2476>Ye<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1057>Galilee<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> stand <S%G2476>ye<s%> <S%G1689>looking<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>? this <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, who was received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2064>shall<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> in <S%G3739>like<s%> <S%G5158>manner<s%> <S%G3739>as<s%> ye beheld <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> returned <S%G5290>they<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> nigh unto <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2192>a<s%> Sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>'s <S%G3598>journey<s%> <S%G2192>off<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> come <S%G1525>in<s%>, they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the upper <S%G5253>chamber<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> they were <S%G2650>abiding<s%>; <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%>, <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%>, <S%G918>Bartholomew<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew<s%>, <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G2207>Zealot<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> the son of <S%G2385>James<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> all3956, 2258 with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G4342>continued<s%> stedfastly in <S%G4335>prayer<s%>, 2532, 1162 <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G3101>brethren<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5037>(and<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G846>a<s%> multitude of persons gathered <S%G1909>together<s%>, about5613, 846 a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%>),

<S%G435><s%> <S%G80>Brethren<s%>, it was <S%G1163>needful<s%> that <S%G3778>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> should be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> spake <S%G4277>before<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%>, who <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3595>guide<s%> to them that <S%G4815>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2674>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2674>numbered<s%> <S%G4862>among<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2975>received<s%> his <S%G2819>portion<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%>.

(Now <S%G3767><s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2932>obtained<s%> a <S%G5564>field<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G3408>reward<s%> of his <S%G93>iniquity<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>falling<s%> <S%G4248>headlong<s%>, he burst <S%G2997>asunder<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> gushed <S%G1632>out<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2730>dwellers<s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G5620>insomuch<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> in their846, 2398 <S%G1258>language<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5564>field<s%> was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G184>Akeldama<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5564>is<s%>, The field of <S%G129>blood<s%>.)

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5568>Psalms<s%>, <S%G1096>Let<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1886>habitation<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> made <S%G2048>desolate<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2077>let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> man <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G846>therein<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G1984>office<s%> <S%G2983>let<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%>.

Of the <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> have <S%G4905>companied<s%> with us2254, 1722 <S%G3956>all<s%> the time5550, 1722 <S%G3739>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>,

beginning <S%G756><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G3739>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he was received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1096>must<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they put <S%G2476>forward<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%>, <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G923>Barsabbas<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2459>Justus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G4336>prayed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, who knowest the <S%G2589>hearts<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G322>men<s%>, show <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3739>the<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> whom thou hast <S%G1586>chosen<s%>,

to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G2819>place<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G3845>fell<s%> <S%G4198>away<s%>, that he might go <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they gave1325, 846 <S%G2819>lots<s%> for <S%G2532>them<s%>; and the <S%G2819>lot<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G4785>numbered<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>.
